text: A reporter exposed the fact that criteria were changed for the top OPP job to suit a Ford friend, and reporters who helped expose possible green belt development, forcing @fordnation gov't to backtrack on both. How's that circumventing the media working out? #onpoli #journalism
author: CPnewsboy

text: Congratulations Anna.
author: CPnewsboy

text: I'll say it again: @fordnation may not like reporters, but he's good for the news business. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: On top of the $105 million a year provincial taxpayers already give the horseracing industry. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Significant changes, but will they be enough for parents of children with #Autism? #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Philpott: "If you look at examples of other types of bullying or harassment, it’s not necessarily as easy as people might think to speak to those who are inflicting it upon you." #cdnpoli http://Macleans.ca  https://www.macleans.ca/politics/ottawa/jane-philpott-theres-much-more-to-the-story-that-needs-to-be-told/ …
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier @fordnation after Integrity Commish found he didn't violate rules in appointing Ron Taverner as head of the OPP: “This represents a complete vindication for our government. This complaint was frivolous and without merit." Ford will meet with reporters at 3:30pm. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier @fordnation did not breach rules when Ron Taverner was named OPP commissioner, but the process was flawed. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Hopefully a lesson for all police officers. #journalism

text: How sad.
author: CPnewsboy

text: It's budget day in Ottawa as the Liberals try to change the channel from the SNC Lavlin affair by offering a little something for everyone ahead of the fall election. I'll discuss with @TazBogaCHCH on the 6pm @CHCHNews #cdnpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier @fordnation finally gets clear: "There's absolutely no truth to any of the allegations" and dares NDP to raise them outside the legislature. Calls the allegations "absolutely ridiculous." #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier @fordnation says NDP Leader  @AndreaHorwath is making "false accusations" in legislature, but knows she would be sued for saying the same thing outside the House. Ford calls Horwath cowardly, then returns to attacking @OntarioNDP fundraiser. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier @fordnation 'responds' to Andrea Horwath questions about unregistered lobbying of his office, as alleged by  @randyhillier, by attacking @OntarioNDP fundraiser. Ford totally ignored questions/allegations of illegal/unlawful raised by  Hillier. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: "@randyhillier took the leader at his word that the party grassroots reigned supreme, that Ford was their servant when he pledged fealty to the membership. That’s why this is a breach of faith for true blue believers, and a blow for fidelity in politics." #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: #ForThePeople
author: CPnewsboy

text: NDP want police to investigate @randyhillier allegations "of possible illegal and unregistered lobbying by close friends and advisors employed by Premier Ford." #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: We also talk about @randyhillier being booted out of @OntarioPCParty caucus. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: GPO @MikeSchreiner I’m especially troubled by allegations that MPP Hillier was told a condition of his reinstatement to caucus was that he would be required to support the Ford gov't 'even when the government is in violation of the law or engaged in unlawful activity.' #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Premier's office responds to MPP @randyhillier's allegations about @fordnation chief of staff Dean French: "Everything Randy Hillier outlined in his letter is an outright lie. These fabrications are absurd and categorically false." #onpoli

text: Randy Hillier's side of the story. #onpoli

text: The @fordnation government admits why the premier really booted MPP @randyhillier from the @OntarioPCParty caucus: "It’s no secret around Queen’s Park that Randy is a frequent visitor to media offices." Oh! The humanity! #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Prime Minister Trudeau will shuffle his cabinet again tomorrow and the Liberals will introduce their pre-election budget Tuesday. I'll look at the busy week ahead in Ottawa with @nicolemartintv at 6pm on @CHCHNews. #cdnpoli
author: CPnewsboy

text: Keep pushing Fatima. Scheer should have had answers to these questions long before today. #cdnpoli

text: .@fordnation boots out  @randyhillier. Dear Randy: A decision has been made by the Leader of our Party to expel you from the @OntarioPCParty Caucus on a permanent basis. This decision has been made after a full review of your conduct prior to and after your suspension. #onpoli
author: CPnewsboy
